Is there a solution for iPhone streaming, while you block all connections to Elgato?

Sorry for double-post, but @MandySTFU: I know you can't update, or even allow any connection to Elgato, because at some moment your serial becomes devalidated.
And then you have to use EyeTV Reporter (Elgato's removal utility) to uninstall EyeTV completely.
Then you can install the old one again and use the same serial, only be sure to block all connections.
Heads up guys, you can download 3.5.4 here: http://edgedownloads.elgato.com/eyetvdownloads/support/eyetv_354_6786.dmg

Hey i have one of the new hdpvrs with the 0x4903 serial. Im having trouble getting eyetv to recognize my hdpvr. Ive removed the file and attempted to reinstall the newest version but i can't seem to get it to work, can someone help?
